sqlMap.select:
SELECT CODOPE, TPOFOR, TRIM(NROFOL) AS NROFOL, TRIM(RUTTRABAJ) AS RUTTRABAJ, FECEMI, DIASUB, MTOLIQ, MTOCOT, CODINT, FINIPA, MOCOPE, BASECA, IDLICE, INIMES, TPOLIC, NDICOT, NDIINC, NDIPAG, MTSBPA, MTSBDI, MCSEGC, MOTCOT, TRIM(OFIPGO) AS OFIPGO, CCOPGO, TRIM(INSSAL) AS INSSAL, SUBMAT, TPOLIQ, FECPGO, MLIQPA, RIMPMS, TRIM(ARCHIV) AS ARCHIV, PERPAG, CORRELATIV, PAGFOL, LICHASFEC FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050
PERPAG = #perpag#
UPPER(TRIM(NROFOL)) like '%$nrofol$%'
UPPER(TRIM(RUTTRABAJ)) like '%$ruttrabaj$%'
PAGFOL=#pagfol#
LICHASFEC=#lichasfec#
fetch FIRST $paginacion$ ROWS ONLY
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO LIEXP.ILFSIL050 (PERPAG,CODOPE,TPOFOR,NROFOL,RUTTRABAJ,FECEMI,DIASUB,MTOLIQ, MTOCOT,CODINT,FINIPA,MOCOPE,BASECA,IDLICE,INIMES,TPOLIC,NDICOT,NDIINC,NDIPAG,MTSBPA,MTSBDI, MCSEGC,MOTCOT,OFIPGO,CCOPGO,INSSAL,SUBMAT,TPOLIQ,FECPGO,MLIQPA,RIMPMS,LICHASFEC,PAGFOL,ARCHIV,CORRELATIV) VALUES( #perpag#, #codope#, #tpofor#, #nrofol#, #ruttrabaj#, #fecemi#, #diasub#, #mtoliq#, #mtocot#, #codint#, #finipa#, #mocope#, #baseca#, #idlice#, #inimes#, #tpolic#, #ndicot#, #ndiinc#, #ndipag#, #mtsbpa#, #mtsbdi#, #mcsegc#, #motcot#, #ofipgo#, #ccopgo#, #inssal#, #submat#, #tpoliq#, #fecpgo#, #mliqpa#, #rimpms#, #lichasfec#, #pagfol#, #archiv#, IFNULL((select max(CORRELATIV)+1 from LIEXP.ILFSIL050 WHERE PERPAG=#perpag#),0)) WITH NC

INSERT INTO LIEXP.ILFSIL050T (PERPAG,CODOPE,TPOFOR,NROFOL,RUTTRABAJ,FECEMI,DIASUB,MTOLIQ, MTOCOT,CODINT,FINIPA,MOCOPE,BASECA,IDLICE,INIMES,TPOLIC,NDICOT,NDIINC,NDIPAG,MTSBPA,MTSBDI, MCSEGC,MOTCOT,OFIPGO,CCOPGO,INSSAL,SUBMAT,TPOLIQ,FECPGO,MLIQPA,RIMPMS,LICHASFEC,PAGFOL,ARCHIV,CORRELATIV) VALUES( #perpag#, #codope#, #tpofor#, #nrofol#, #ruttrabaj#, #fecemi#, #diasub#, #mtoliq#, #mtocot#, #codint#, #finipa#, #mocope#, #baseca#, #idlice#, #inimes#, #tpolic#, #ndicot#, #ndiinc#, #ndipag#, #mtsbpa#, #mtsbdi#, #mcsegc#, #motcot#, #ofipgo#, #ccopgo#, #inssal#, #submat#, #tpoliq#, #fecpgo#, #mliqpa#, #rimpms#, #lichasfec#, #pagfol#, #archiv#, IFNULL((select max(CORRELATIV)+1 from LIEXP.ILFSIL050 WHERE PERPAG=#perpag#),0)) WITH NC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE LIEXP.ILFSIL050 SET CODOPE=#codope#, TPOFOR=#tpofor#, FECEMI=#fecemi#, DIASUB=#diasub#, MTOLIQ=#mtoliq#, MTOCOT=#mtocot#, CODINT=#codint#, FINIPA=#finipa#, MOCOPE=#mocope#, BASECA=#baseca#, IDLICE=#idlice#, INIMES=#inimes#, TPOLIC=#tpolic#, NDICOT=#ndicot#, NDIINC=#ndiinc#, NDIPAG=#ndipag#, MTSBPA=#mtsbpa#, MTSBDI=#mtsbdi#, MCSEGC=#mcsegc#, MOTCOT=#motcot#, OFIPGO=#ofipgo#, CCOPGO=#ccopgo#, INSSAL=#inssal#, SUBMAT=#submat#, TPOLIQ=#tpoliq#, FECPGO=#fecpgo#, MLIQPA=#mliqpa#, RIMPMS=#rimpms#, ARCHIV=#archiv#, NROFOL=#nrofol#, RUTTRABAJ=#ruttrabaj#, PERPAG=#perpag#, PAGFOL=#pagfol#, LICHASFEC=#lichasfec# WHERE TRIM(PERPAG)=#perpag# AND TRIM(NROFOL)=#nrofol# AND TRIM(RUTTRABAJ)=#ruttrabaj# AND PAGFOL=#pagfol# AND LICHASFEC=#lichasfec# WITH NC

UPDATE LIEXP.ILFSIL054 SET RUTTRAB = '$new_rut$', NROFOL = '$new_folio$', LICHASFEC= $new_fecTerminoLic$, PAGFOL= $new_pagfol$ WHERE PERPAG=$old_periodo$ AND TRIM(RUTTRAB)='$old_rut$' AND TRIM(NROFOL)='$old_folio$' AND LICHASFEC=$old_fecTerminoLic$ AND PAGFOL=$old_pagfol$ WITH NC
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050 WHERE TRIM(PERPAG)=#perpag# AND TRIM(NROFOL)=#nrofol# AND TRIM(RUTTRABAJ)=#ruttrabaj# AND TRIM(PAGFOL)=#pagfol# AND TRIM(LICHASFEC)=#lichasfec# WITH NC
sqlMap.select: select COUNT(*) as total from LIEXP.ILFSIL050 WHERE PERPAG=#perpag#

select * from LIEXP.ILFSIL050
PERPAG=#perpag#
CORRELATIV > $ultimoLista$
order by CORRELATIV FETCH FIRST $registrosPorPagina$ ROWS ONLY

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050
PERPAG=#perpag#
CORRELATIV < $primeroLista$
order by CORRELATIV DESC FETCH FIRST $registrosPorPagina$ ROWS ONLY ) AS C order by CORRELATIV

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050 AS A
TRIM(PERPAG) = TRIM($perpag$)
ORDER BY A.CORRELATIV DESC FETCH FIRST $registrosPorPagina$ ROWS ONLY )AS C ORDER BY C.CORRELATIV ASC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE LIEXP.ILFSIL050 SET CORRELATIV=(CORRELATIV-1) WHERE CORRELATIV>#idEliminado# and PERPAG=#perpag# WITH NC
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*)AS TOTAL FROM LIEXP.ILFSIL050 A INNER JOIN LIEXP.ILFSIL054 B ON A.PERPAG=B.PERPAG AND A.NROFOL = B.NROFOL AND RUTTRABAJ=RUTTRAB AND A.PAGFOL=B.PAGFOL AND A.LICHASFEC=B.LICHASFEC WHERE A.PERPAG=$fecha$ AND B.TIPOBS='1'
